topic.name: a woman is brutalized for spectacle
topic.notName: no women are brutalized for spectacle
topic.keywords: violence against women, female victimization, exploitation, brutality, misogyny
topic.description: Many women are victims of physical violence and abuse. Women in media are often made into narrative props that get used as targets for violence, for shock value. This may overlap with some cases of other categories, but encompasses the broader range of situations where women are made into hapless victims of brutal treatment, for shock. Being able to know, beforehand, whether a piece of media includes this trope would be greatly beneficial to many women.
